pageContext.claim: “The vast majority of Americans, the risk is very, very low. Young and healthy people can expect to recover fully and quickly if they should get the virus. The highest risk is for elderly population with underlying health conditions. The elderly population must be very, very careful.”
pageContext.analysis: People of all ages are susceptible to cover-19. Older people and those with pre-existing conditions initially appeared to be more vulnerable to the virus. But hundreds of younger people have now died from the virus.
